definition: cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke

sentences.english: Schelling had spent years trying to kick his tobacco addiction.
sentences.chinese: 謝林試圖戒除煙癮已經有多年時間了。

sentences.english: He has never conquered his addiction to smoking.
Suck on one whenever a cig craving hits.
sentences.chinese: 當煙癮來是請吸吮一根。

sentences.english: When you have a craving for a cigarette, suck on a lollipop or chew some gum.
sentences.chinese: 當你煙癮發作時，用棒棒糖或口香糖代替吸菸。

sentences.english: Why do people overeat, or smoke or drink in the first place?
sentences.chinese: 當初人們爲什麼會暴飲暴食，染上煙癮酒癮？

definition: voice change (at puberty)/to alter one's voice (deliberately)/to sound different (when angry etc)
an assortment/a bit of everything/lots of different (skills)
to not go home until drunk (idiom)/let's make a night of it!
drinking party/to go on a binge/to paint the town red
dichlorvos C4H7Cl2PO4, organic phosphate used as insecticide (loanword)/also called dimethyl dichloro-vinyl phosphate DDVP
can't be bought for one thousand in gold (idiom)
to have had enough of/to be fed up with/to have had one's fill of
